description.zh-CN: 精简版AppleALC，仅支持数字音频输出，适用于只需要数字音频的系统
description.zh-TW: 精简版AppleALC，仅支援数字音频输出，适用于只需要数字音频的系統
description.zh-HK: 精简版AppleALC，仅支援数字音频输出，适用于只需要数字音频的系統
description.ja: A minimal バージョン of AppleALC, サポートing only digital オーディオ output. Suitable for システムs that only require digital オーディオ.
description.ko: A minimal 버전 of AppleALC, 지원ing only digital 오디오 output. Suitable for 시스템s that only require digital 오디오.
description.es: A minimal versión of AppleALC, soporteing only digital audio output. Suitable for sistemas that only require digital audio.
description.fr: A minimal version of AppleALC, supporting only digital audio output. Suitable for systèmes that only require digital audio.
description.de: A minimal Version of AppleALC, Unterstützunging only digital Audio output. Suitable for Systems that only require digital Audio.
description.ru: A minimal версия of AppleALC, поддержкаing only digital аудио output. Suitable for системаs that only require digital аудио.
description.en: A minimal version of AppleALC, supporting only digital audio output. Suitable for systems that only require digital audio.

version.changelog:
#### v1.9.6
- Added ALC235 layout-id 20 for Lenovo ThinkCentre M920x-N000 by Xezun
- Added ALCS1220A layout-id 89 for Asus Z890 ProArt Creator WiFi by caley13
- Added ALC256 layout-id 41 for Asus X412FAG by I3qua
- Update controllers.plist with Raptor Lake-P/U/H cAVS Audio Controller (0x51CA) by...
